response.overview: Tony Award-winner Richard Nelsonâ€™s three-play cycle follows one year in the life of an American family in Rhinebeck, NY, during the 2016 presidential election. "Hungry" is part one. The trilogy was filmed at The Public Theater in March 2017 and stars Meg Gibson, Lynn Hawley, Roberta Maxwell, Maryann Plunkett, Jay O. Sanders, and Amy Warren.
response.title: Hungry
